summary: Frontend-only testing completed successfully. All core features tested and working correctly. Auth flow, dashboard, tab navigation, receipt CRUD, reports, and settings all functional with proper testID attributes.

issues: React Native Web deprecation warnings: 'shadow*' style props deprecated (use boxShadow instead)
